General.Name: MPDAESAN Inc.
General.Description: MPDAESAN Inc. owns and franchises pizza restaurants in South Korea, China, and internationally. The company operates its restaurants under the Mr. Pizza and Monoffin brands. It also engages in the wholesale and retail of cosmetic products, as well as provides catering services. The company was formerly known as MP Group, Inc and changed its name to MPDAESAN Inc. in June 2021. MPDAESAN Inc. was founded in 1990 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
